mapper.update: UPDATE goods_request SET goods_request_approval=1 where goods_request_code=#{goodsRequestCode};
mapper.select: SELECT goods_request_code, member_id, goods_request_name, goods_category_sub_name, goods_request_price, goods_request_amount, goods_request_image, goods_request_desc, goods_request_date FROM goods_request WHERE goods_request_approval=0;

SELECT goods_request_code, member_id, goods_request_name, goods_category_sub_name, goods_request_price, goods_request_amount, goods_request_image, goods_request_desc, goods_request_date FROM goods_request WHERE goods_request_approval=1;
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 'g001' ELSE CONCAT('g', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(goods_request_code,2,3)AS DECIMAL)+1),3,0)) END AS goods_request_code FROM goods_request;

SELECT goods_category_sub_name FROM goods_category_sub as sub INNER JOIN goods_category_main as main ON sub.goods_category_main_code = main.goods_category_main_code WHERE main.goods_category_main_name=#{goodsMainCategory};
SELECT COUNT(req.member_id) FROM goods_inventory as inv INNER JOIN goods_request as req ON inv.goods_request_code = req.goods_request_code WHERE req.member_id=#{memberId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods_request (goods_request_code, member_id, goods_request_name, goods_category_sub_name, goods_request_price, goods_request_amount, goods_request_image, goods_request_desc, goods_request_date, goods_request_approval )VALUES ( #{goodsRequestCode}, #{goodsSellerId}, #{goodsRequestName}, #{goodsCategorySubName}, #{goodsRequestPrice}, #{goodsRequestAmount}, #{goodsRequestImage}, #{goodsRequestDesc}, CURDATE(), 0 );
